Contributing
============

We welcome contributions from researchers, developers, and climate enthusiasts alike.

How to Contribute
-----------------

1. Fork the repository on GitHub
2. Create a branch for your feature/fix
3. Submit a pull request with a detailed explanation

Resources
---------

- `Contribution Guide <https://github.com/Climalysis/climalysis/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md>`_
- `Discussions <https://github.com/Climalysis/climalysis/discussions>`_
